features: M-Tech Motor - Be Faster and Silenter: YIOU Air Purifiers M1 can purify 35ft³ in 30s with noise levels below 55db as well as be silenter than white noise in sleep mode at night, especially designed air purifiers for home large room.

Double Air FIlters and Filter Life Percentage Display: YIOU air purifier M1 is constructed with near 360° double inlets and works with 2 true H13 HEPA air filters which can block airborne pollutants as small as 0.3μm in diameter. Particularly, the filter life percange is shown clearly on the LED screen.

Visible Interaction: The LED screen can show the changes done to the air purifier controled by the panel and the remote, which will help to control the air purifier more conveniently in a large room. Air quality is also shown clearly on the LED screen through the indicator and the index.

Perceivable Air Quality Improvement: Let YIOU air purifier M1 work 30s will let you have 35ft³ purified air to breathe deeply. With a CADR of 235, YIOU air purifier M1 can purifiy a room of 387ft² in 12 minutes and a room up to 960ft² in 30 minutes.

Auto Monitor and Intimate Functions: Work with the indicator, the auto monitor of YIOU air purifier M1 can help maintain the air quality automatically. Equipped with filter life percentage, child lock and timer functions make YIOU air purifier M1 your smart home appliance.
body.description: YIOU Air Purifiers M1 show our high attention to customer experience. The new model of air purifier adopts improved motor and chip for stronger effextiveness on air purification, lower noise disturbdance and impressive interaction controlled by panel and remote.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this air purifier with double-sided inlets and I am extremely impressed with its performance. I have been using it for several days now and have noticed a significant improvement in the air quality in my home.The double-sided inlets are a unique feature that allows the purifier to draw in air from both sides, which increases its overall efficiency. This means that it can clean the air in a larger area much more quickly than other purifiers. I have a large living room and this purifier is able to handle it with ease.One of the things I love most about this air purifier is how quiet it is. I often forget that it's even on because it is so unobtrusive. The sleek design also makes it a great addition to any room in my home. The touch panel controls are easy to use and allow me to adjust the settings as needed.Another great feature of this air purifier is the automatic mode. It detects the air quality in the room and adjusts its speed accordingly. This means that it's not working harder than it needs to, which saves energy and extends the life of the filters.Overall, I am extremely happy with my purchase of this air purifier. It is efficient, effective, and easy to use. The double-sided inlets are a unique feature that sets it apart from other purifiers on the market. I would highly recommend this air purifier to anyone looking for a high-quality solution to indoor air pollution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently moved to new apartment and now is pollen allergy season , the air quality at home worries me a bit, I did some research and decided to purchase this air purifier, i am extremely satisfied with my purchase,the machine is incredibly easy to setup and use,the purifier has multiple fan speeds and the timer ⏲️,and very quiet,even on the highest setting.the night mode features is also great,as it allows me to a good sleep ,soundly without any distractions noise or,great for my bedroom and living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It made a big difference
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is for my photography studio room, and it has significantly improved the air quality. The automatic mode adapts the fan speed to match the room's air quality, and the low noise level is ideal for my studio. Additionally, the design is attractive, and the touch panel controls are user-friendly. I am extremely satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Purchased a second one.
reviews.reviewText: Great product. You can see what it is pulling out of the air.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just as described
reviews.reviewText: I bought the white. Like the look. Like the 2 filters. Really only hear the fan on medium and high. Night mode is very quiet (almost silent) and the light dims. Very easy to operate. Has many options such as night mode, auto, low-med-high fan, child lock, filter reset. Only thing I do not like is that when you push the button to turn it off, the light blinks (I guess to let you know it's off), but I would prefer it to not blink. Liked it so much I bought a second one for another room shortly after the first purchase. FYI - air quality is the number on the front and when I googled it, websites say it should be 12 or below to be good air quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great purifier. It detects smoke and automatically kicks into high gear or you can put it on manual mode or night mode, where the lights turn off and it gets super quiet. The double filters are something you don't see in other purifiers of this price. I have used it only for a couple weeks and liked it so much I bought another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Design and Works Well
reviews.reviewText: There are options for the fan, lowest option is pretty quiet. It has different functions as well, I’m still exploring. It works well in a medium size bedroom. The remote is very convenient and it can be place in the slot easily. Decent quality seems it can last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a small area, Keeps your air quality at safe, healthy levels.
reviews.reviewText: I like the small size, it's very quiet, especially in sleep mode. The touch controls are on the top of the unit so you can see exactly what the settings are. On the front of the unit is the air particle reading and indicates by color and parts per million the particle range. On days when the air quality is in the unhealthy range it is a relief to see the air in my room is well within the healthy range.
